data.name: Master of Pieces © Jigsaw Puzzles - Mandalas Part 1 DLC
data.detailed_description:
A mandala is a sacred symbol of harmony, unity, and integrity of the universe, the world, and man in this world.
Nature itself likes to draw mandalas. These are the blossoming flowers of daisies or sunflowers, seashells, snowflakes, tree rings, spider webs, or water rings.

Immerse yourself in a world of relaxation with the challenging and exciting puzzles from Mandalas pack

Contains 15 beautiful pictures
data.about_the_game:
A mandala is a sacred symbol of harmony, unity, and integrity of the universe, the world, and man in this world.
Nature itself likes to draw mandalas. These are the blossoming flowers of daisies or sunflowers, seashells, snowflakes, tree rings, spider webs, or water rings.

Immerse yourself in a world of relaxation with the challenging and exciting puzzles from Mandalas pack

Contains 15 beautiful pictures
data.short_description: Immerse yourself in a world of relaxation with the challenging and exciting Jigsaw Puzzles from Mandalas pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
